front.title: Requirements for Management of Name Servers for the DNS

abstract.t: Management of name servers for the Domain Name Service (DNS) hastraditionally been done using vendor-specific monitoring,configuration and control methods. Although some service monitoringplatforms can test the functionality of the DNS itself there is not ainteroperable way to manage (monitor, control and configure) theinternal aspects of a name server itself.This document discusses the requirements of a management system forDNS name servers. A management solution that is designed to managethe DNS can use this document as a shopping list of needed features.
